item.title: ESP32 Module for AC Infinity AirTap T4/T6.
item.author: team@silocitylabs.com (Silo City Labs)
item.description: At SiloCityLabs, we’re always working to improve our products, and 2025 has brought a number of exciting updates to our ESP32 Module for AC Infinity Airtap T4/T6! With new features and design enhancements, this latest version offers better smart home integration, improved usability, and customization options.

item.description: Are you looking to take your Filament Dryer to the next level? The Filament Dryer PCB is the ultimate upgrade, adding enhanced filament material support, a better display, and smart home integration to ensure your 3D printing workflow is seamless and efficient.

item.title: Smart Home Upgrades with ESP32 and ESPHome

item.description: At Silocity Labs, we’ve always loved exploring innovative technology and making the world of electronics more accessible. Recently, we’ve opened a new shop featuring some of our favorite creations: ESPHome-compatible smart devices built on the powerful ESP32 platform.
